channel.title: Question
channel.description: How do i change how fast someone levels up? For example mage levels up to slow and i want to make it fast. How do i do so?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

[quote=“jj0001, post:8, topic:332260”][quote author=daxter852 link=topic=428700.msg3147168#msg3147168 date=1268181510]
What is the 1000 and the 6?
[/quote]The 1000 is the XP you get and the 6 is the skill ID.[/quote]
k thanks guys!

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“daxter852, post:6, topic:332260”]What is the 1000 and the 6?[/quote]The 1000 is the XP you get and the 6 is the skill ID.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:5, topic:332260”]High alch is in client.java I think.

castSpell == 1178

Scroll down to addSkillXp and change the first number.[/quote]

if(castSpell == 1178) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 55) { if((HasItemAmount(561, 1)==false) || (HasItemAmount(554, 5)==false) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1387 || (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1387) && (HasItemAmount(561, 1)==false)) { sM("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } if((HasItemAmount(561, 1)==true) && (HasItemAmount(554, 5)==true) || (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1387) && (HasItemAmount(561, 1)==true)) { if(castOnItem == 995) { sM("You can't cast high alchemy on gold."); } else { if(castOnItem == 1) { sM("You cant convert this item."); } else if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ actionInterval = 3000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(713); specGFX(113); addSkillXP(1000, 6); alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); sendFrame106(6); deleteItem(561, getItemSlot(561), 1);//Remove nature rune if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 1387){ deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 5); //Remove fire rune } } } } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 54) { sM("You need a magic level of 55 to cast this spell."); } }
Do you mean that, that i highlighted in yellow? What is the 1000 and the 6?

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

High alch is in client.java I think.

castSpell == 1178

Scroll down to addSkillXp and change the first number.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

deathschaos9:

Magic is different, you have to go into magicSpells.cfg and change the base exp on a delta base. I don’t know what base your using, but delta is the most popular so try that.

//------ID------emote--gfx----usesFirst-lvl----rune1--rune1am--rune2---rune2am--rune3--rune3am--rune4--rune4am-item---hitdiff--XP-----projH.--EndH.----SpellName spell = 1152 711 90 1 1 558 1 556 1 -1 0 -1 0 -1 2 40 43 100 Wind_Strike
This is what I get. I wanna change the high alch to like about four times faster exp. What do i need to edit?

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Magic is different, you have to go into magicSpells.cfg and change the base exp on a delta base. I don’t know what base your using, but delta is the most popular so try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

In client.java use Ctrl + F and try to search:

addSkillXP

Tell me if that worked.
